reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 385/00: 2000 SCHOOL TAX INSTALMENTS - MUNICIPALITY OF BROCKTON
reg_info.reg_name_text: 2000 SCHOOL TAX INSTALMENTS — MUNICIPALITY OF BROCKTON
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 385/00: 2000 SCHOOL TAX INSTALMENTS - MUNICIPALITY OF BROCKTON

content.content: 1. The time on or before which the Municipality of Brockton shall pay the instalment referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act for 2000 is extended to December 31, 2000. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 1. Third Instalment
content.raw_html:
1. The time on or before which the Municipality of Brockton shall pay the instalment referred to in paragraph 2 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act for 2000 is extended to December 31, 2000. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 1.

Third Instalment

content.content: 2. The time on or before which the Municipality of Brockton shall pay the instalment referred to in paragraph 3 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act for 2000 is extended to December 31, 2000. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 2. Fourth Instalment
content.raw_html:
2. The time on or before which the Municipality of Brockton shall pay the instalment referred to in paragraph 3 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act for 2000 is extended to December 31, 2000. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 2.

Fourth Instalment

content.content: 3. The time on or before which the Municipality of Brockton shall pay the instalment referred to in paragraph 4 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act for 2000 is extended to December 31, 2000. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 3. General
content.raw_html:
3. The time on or before which the Municipality of Brockton shall pay the instalment referred to in paragraph 4 of subsection 257.11 (1) of the Act for 2000 is extended to December 31, 2000. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 3.

General

content.content: 4. Instalments referred to in sections 1, 2 and 3 shall be paid to the Province rather than to boards. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 4. Français
content.raw_html:
4. Instalments referred to in sections 1, 2 and 3 shall be paid to the Province rather than to boards. O. Reg. 385/00, s. 4.

Français
